sentences.sContent: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.sContent_eng: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.sCn: 硫酸铜具有防腐性，这是不曾有过问题的。

sentences.sContent: Polyurethane is a kind of excellent anticorrosion material, material has excellent antiseptic effect on metal substrate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Polyurethane is a kind of excellent anticorrosion material, material has excellent antiseptic effect on metal substrate.
sentences.sCn: 聚胺又是一种优良的防腐材料，对金属底材具有优异的防腐作用。

sentences.sContent: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.sCn: 不要只是捐钱，去某个地方做志愿者吧，这样你就可以和别人直接互动。你的生活太“防腐”了，你开始觉得有点无聊了吧。

synos.tran: [助剂]防腐的，[药]抗菌的；非常整洁的

remMethod.val: anti(反) + sept(菌) + ic → 杀菌剂

trans.tranOther: a medicine that you put onto a wound to stop it from becoming infected
